name: FreeFem++ Binaries
short_description:
FreeFem++ is an implementation of a language dedicated to the finite element method. 

The source code can be found in the web site of the original project http://www.freefem.org/ff++

In this page you can find a precompiled binary package for Ubuntu (for i386 and amd64).

Use the blog for any comments
summary: It enables you to solve PDE easily
